name: Top Terraform Gardener (BETA)
description:
Top Terraform Gardener is a card battler where you compete in an alien reality show by conquering planets and impressing the judges. While you rampage through 3 separate galaxies made of their own unique worlds, you build up a deck made up of your conquests to become the champion. Good luck, Contestant! 

Note: This is the beta version of the game and it is still in development. If you have any issues please leave a comment and I will add it to the long todo list.
